ISSUE.TITLE: Enable filter execution summary in request context
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Feature to insert filter execution status and latency information into the request context for use in response headers. This information is useful in identifying the filters that are participating in the lifecycle of a request that is processed by zuul.
